field.label: Enable Transport Node
field.help: Enable transport mode to forward packets for other peers. Only enable this on stationary, always-on, well-connected nodes. Not every node should be a transport node â€” only strategic points that provide connectivity between network segments.

field.label: Share Instance
field.help: Allow multiple programs to share this Reticulum instance via the shared instance port.

field.label: Shared Instance Port
field.help: TCP port for shared instance communication between local programs.

field.label: Instance Control Port
field.help: TCP port for instance control operations.

field.label: Panic on Interface Error
field.help: Terminate Reticulum if any interface encounters an error during startup. Useful for ensuring all interfaces are operational.

field.label: Log Level
field.help: Logging verbosity. Notice (4) is recommended for normal operation. Use Debug (7) for troubleshooting.
